data.event: Hamilton was laid out in 1852 by several men in the area, including Samuel Gordon and Bryant Bartlett.

event.title: was officially incorporated as a town in 1854

data.event: Hamilton was officially incorporated as a town in 1854, and then re-incorporated as a city in 1859.
Hamilton was officially incorporated as a town in 1854, and then re-incorporated as a city in 1859.
